page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: St. Mary's School has 50 pupils and is very small.There are only 13 people in our class and 2 teachers.I like our class, it is nice some days. I do not like homework very much.I like Maths, Art, Science and Drawing.Today we began our bicycle Proficiency Test.I brought my bike. We learnt how to get on the road and how to do a right turn. Today was a typical day in my life.I get up every morning at 8.15am, then I get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast at 8.20am. At 8.45am I go to school which starts at precisely 9am.At 10.30am it is playtime and we come in at 10.45am. We have our dinner at 12pm and dinner play. We come in at 1pm, at 2.20pm we have playtime to 2.40pm. At 3pm the Infants go home, but we go home at 3.30pm. When I get home I take the dogs out..
